books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of the fabulously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by the Party and its leader, Big Brother.

books.title: The Art of War
books.author: Sun Tzu
books.description: An ancient Chinese military treatise dating from the Late Spring and Autumn Period.
